text:
Farmers staged a road roko in Vandavasi demanding better price for their paddy in the regulated market.

The farmers from the villages around Vandavasi used to sell the paddy in the regulated market in Vandvasi-Melmaruvathur road.

On Friday they felt the price offered to their paddy was not enough. They staged a sit-in. Police intervened and urged them to give up the protest.

- Staff Reporter
title: Farmers stage road roko
